name: Wicked Dukes
description: The feared Wicked Dukes, masters of the maritime underworld, ruled with an iron fist and a thirst for gold that knew no bounds.

name: Mischievous Kings of Sunken Empire
description: Under the black flag of Mischievous Kings, the oceans become a stage for daring escapades and untold riches, where every wave whispers tales of their legendary exploits.

name: Anxious Captains
description: In the treacherous waters of the Calvario, Anxious Captains as the most feared pirate alliance, hoarding riches and leaving a trail of chaos in its wake.
